page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content: Sharon Wallis lives near Old Field Brow Estate 24 Walton Rd. She has 3 older brothers and goes to Loreto Grammar School.She leaves at 8.00 to 8.15 am.Sharon likes Friday mornings because she likes the double art period.At breaktime,Sharon does not participate in any sport or activity,but stays in the classroom amongst friends.Her break is usually a carton of vimto and two packets of crisps.At lunch,on Friday,the school dinner consists of chips,fish and a glass of orange.Sharon prefers Friday dinners to any others.After lunch, Sharon participates in Classic's Club. After school,Sharon walks home.She has her tea at 4.15 because she has to go Irish dancing at 5.30.Then she walks home and does her homework or watches some television.At 9.00 Sharon goes to bed.
